site_name: JOHNNY MORRIS' WONDERS OF WIDLIFE FOUNDATION
narrative:
This 1st pre-license inspection and exit briefing for a Class C license were conducted with a facility representative.
No non-compliant items were identified during this inspection.
The applicant will submit a copy of this report along with the license fee to the Regional Office at:
USDA-APHIS-Animal Care
2150 Centre Ave
Building B, Mail Stop 3W11
Fort Collins, CO  80526
REGULATED ACTIVITIES CAN NOT BE PERFORMED UNTIL A USDA LICENSE CERTIFICATE HAS BEEN
ISSUED BY THE REGIONAL OFFICE.
